meta.name: Wolves of the Fang - Colosseum
meta.format: Colosseum: No Epic Heroes, max T9, 2+ INFANTRY, 1+ CHARACTER

units.name: Blood Claws
abilities: Berserk Charge: Can charge after Advancing
units.notes: Wolf Priest attached. Charge: S5 AP-2 chainswords, +1W from Litany

units.name: Grey Hunters
abilities: Cunning Hunters: RR Wound 1s (Full RR Wound on objectives)
units.notes: OC3 best holders. Charge: S5 AP-2 chainswords. Full RR Wound on objectives

units.name: Venerable Dreadnought
abilities: Fervour of the Ancients (Aura): +1 Adv/Chg for SW w/in 6"
units.notes: Aura: +1 Adv/Chg w/in 6". Charge: axe S11 AP-3. Use Smokescreen

keywords.Deadly Demise X: On death, roll D6: on 6, each unit w/in 6" takes X mortal wounds
keywords.Grenades: Enables Grenade strat (1CP): Roll 6D6 vs visible enemy w/in 8" (not in Engagement); each 4+ = 1 mortal wound
keywords.Smoke: Enables Smokescreen strat (1CP): -1 to Hit vs unit until your next turn
keywords.Leader: Attaches to a Bodyguard unit. While leading, gains Bodyguard protection
keywords.Ignores Cover: Target does not benefit from cover saves
keywords.Pistol: Can shoot in Engagement Range; only Pistols can fire if in Engagement
keywords.Hazardous: After resolving attacks, roll D6: on 1, bearer takes 3 mortal wounds (CHAR) or is destroyed (non-CHAR)
keywords.Lance Charge (Detachment): Units that charged: melee weapons get +1S and +1AP until end of turn
keywords.Assault: Can shoot after Advancing (at normal BS)
keywords.Blast: +1 attack per 5 models in target unit

detachmentRule.name: Lance Charge
detachmentRule.effect: Units that made a charge move: melee weapons get +1 Strength and +1 AP until end of turn. Includes attached characters.

factionRule.name: Oath of Moment (Divergent)
factionRule.effect: Start of Cmd phase: pick 1 enemy unit. RR ALL Hit rolls vs that unit. NOTE: Space Wolves do NOT get +1 to Wound (divergent chapter).

coreStratagems.name: Command Re-roll
coreStratagems.effect: RR one Hit, Wound, Damage, Save, Advance, or Charge roll

coreStratagems.name: Counter-offensive
coreStratagems.effect: After enemy unit fights, one of your units fights next

coreStratagems.name: Epic Challenge
coreStratagems.effect: CHAR gets [PRECISION] for melee attacks this phase

coreStratagems.name: Fire Overwatch
coreStratagems.effect: Shoot at enemy ending move w/in 24"; hit on 6s only

coreStratagems.name: Go to Ground
coreStratagems.effect: Unit gets +1 Save & Benefit of Cover until next turn; Battle-shocked

coreStratagems.name: Grenade
coreStratagems.effect: GRENADES unit (not in Engagement, hasn't shot): pick visible enemy w/in 8" not in Engagement; roll 6D6, each 4+ = 1 MW

coreStratagems.name: Heroic Intervention
coreStratagems.effect: After enemy charges, your unit w/in 6" makes D6" move toward them

coreStratagems.name: Rapid Ingress
coreStratagems.effect: Set up one Reserves unit at end of enemy Move phase

coreStratagems.name: Smokescreen
coreStratagems.effect: SMOKE unit: -1 to Hit vs this unit until your next turn

coreStratagems.name: Tank Shock
coreStratagems.effect: VEHICLE/MOUNTED: after charge, pick enemy w/in Engagement; roll D6 per model, 5+ = MW

detachmentStratagems.name: Armour of Contempt
detachmentStratagems.effect: Worsen AP of attacks vs ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit by 1

detachmentStratagems.name: Blitzing Fusillade
detachmentStratagems.effect: Unit that Advanced: ranged attacks get [ASSAULT] & +1 to Hit

detachmentStratagems.name: Lightning Assault
detachmentStratagems.effect: Unit that Fell Back: +2 to Charge roll this phase

detachmentStratagems.name: Storm of Violence
detachmentStratagems.effect: Unit that charged: melee Crit Hits cause 1 extra hit

detachmentStratagems.name: Ride Hard, Ride Fast
detachmentStratagems.effect: MOUNTED/FLY VEHICLE (no WALKERS): -1 to Hit & -1 to Wound vs target. N/A in this list.

detachmentStratagems.name: Pack Hunters
detachmentStratagems.effect: SW unit: +1 to Wound in melee vs enemy engaged by another SW unit

command.text: OATH OF MOMENT: Pick 1 enemy unit. ALL your units re-roll ALL hit rolls vs it (shooting + melee). Pick the biggest threat.
WOLF PRIEST RESURRECT: Bring back 1 dead Blood Claw. Place in coherency. Do this EVERY turn you have casualties.

movement.text: STORMLANCE: All units can Advance and still charge! Blood Claws ALSO have Berserk Charge (same effect). USE THIS AGGRESSIVELY.
VEN DREAD POSITIONING: +1 Adv/Chg aura for all SW within 6". Keep him central so Blood Claws and Grey Hunters benefit.

shooting.text: OATH TARGET: Prioritize shooting the Oath target. Grey Hunters have 20 bolt carbine shots (30 at half range w/ Rapid Fire).
VEN DREAD HEAVY FLAMER: D6 auto-hits at S5 AP-1. Use to clear screens before charging with Blood Claws.
BLITZING FUSILLADE (1CP): If unit Advanced, ranged attacks get [ASSAULT] & +1 to Hit. Good for Grey Hunters advancing and shooting.

charge.text: STORM OF VIOLENCE (1CP): Charging unit's melee crit hits (6s) generate 1 extra hit. Use on Blood Claws (36+ attacks with Wolf Priest).
VEN DREAD AURA: +1 to Charge for units within 6". 8" charge becomes 7". Stack with Command Re-roll.
LIGHTNING ASSAULT (1CP): Fell Back unit gets +2 to Charge. Fall Back and re-charge for Lance Charge bonus again!

fight.text: LANCE CHARGE MATH: Blood Claws on charge: chainswords S5 AP-2 + Wolf Priest +1W = wound MEQ on 3+ at AP-2. DEVASTATING.
PACK HUNTERS (1CP): +1 to Wound if another SW unit is also fighting same enemy. Stack with Wolf Priest for +2 to Wound total.
VEN DREAD MELEE: Greataxe strike on charge = S11 AP-3 D6+1. Use vs vehicles/monsters. Sweep (A12 S7 AP-3) vs hordes.
EPIC CHALLENGE (1CP): Wolf Priest gets [PRECISION] in melee. Snipe enemy characters with S7 AP-2 D2 crozius on charge.

endOfTurn.text: COLOSSEUM SCORING: 5 VP per objective held (max 15/round, 50/game). Starts scoring Turn 2. Grey Hunters are OC3 - your best holders.
SECONDARY: Bring It Down (1x2 = Ven Dread worth 2VP if killed), Assassination (1 Character). Protect Wolf Priest.

colosseumNotes.scoring: 5 VP per objective held (max 15/round, 50/game), starts Turn 2
